name: Umbra (itch)
description:
A lone archer braves his way through the city of demons in this side-scrolling Nes-esque platformer.

Controls :

Movement - W, A, S, D

Attack/Jump - J, K +Requested (You can also jump with space)

Any and all feedback is welcome, I want to make this game the best I can, will consider all serious feedback!

Game currently does have a few bugs I am aware. Working actively to get it finished and fixed! Please send me an email if you see any pop up! Thanks for understanding!

Coming soon - Bug fixes
